body:
You can use this [letter template](#). 

Remember to include: 

- details of the problem and how it is affecting you
- dates of when you contacted your landlord 
- date when you previously contacted the local council
heading: Contact your Local Council again
lede: If you've had no response from your Local Council, or you did get a response but the problem is still not resolved or even significantly worse, you should contact your Local Council again.
